title: ZOOX Chic Hair Claw Clip by French Designer, A New Twist On Ordinary Hair Clips (Purple Amethyst Butterfly)
features: Designed to Hold Hair with No Discomfort or Pull
description: NOTES: We intentionally make each batch with slightly different mix to mimic real stone. So don't be surprised if some have slightly different color hue. It is what makes it it. A new twist on the ordinary claw clips. They look like crystal but are lightweight and strong. It's a perfect accessory to wear poolside or with your favorite little dress.   We won’t blame you if you can’t stop wondering about all the hairstyles that you can wear using hair claw clips. Lucky for you, our hair claw clips can be incorporated into a number of unique and trendy hairstyles to any occasion.
